Package productClasses.Inheritances

Class Stationery

java.lang.Object
productClasses.Product
productClasses.Inheritances.Stationery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Stationery extends Product implements Serializable
The Stationery class represents a stationery product in an online marketplace. It extends the Product class and includes additional attributes specific to stationery.
See Also:
